description: Detects suspicious children of application launched from inside the WindowsApps directory. This could be a sign of a rogue ".appx" package installation/execution
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali
name: Suspicious Windows App Activity
query: (process.parent.executable.text:*C\:\\Program\ Files\\WindowsApps\\* AND ((process.executable.text:(*\\poweshell.exe OR *\\pwsh.exe OR *\\rundll32.exe OR *\\regsvr32.exe OR *\\mshta.exe OR *\\cscript.exe OR *\\wscript.exe)) OR (process.command_line.text:(*cmd\ \/c* OR *Invoke\-* OR *Base64*))))
